chapters.title: The Aspiring Archer
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a tribal prince, seeks to learn archery and approaches Guru Dronacharya for training.

chapters.title: The Self-Taught Student
chapters.description: Denied formal training, Ekalavya creates a clay idol of Dronacharya and practices diligently, achieving mastery.

chapters.title: Drona's Request
chapters.description: Impressed by Ekalavya's skill, Dronacharya asks for his guru dakshina: Ekalavya's thumb.

chapters.title: A Sacrifice for Reverence
chapters.description: Ekalavya, honoring his guru, sacrifices his thumb, displaying ultimate devotion and humility.
